definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: Also Massimo Moratti has announced officially his new coach.
sentences.chinese: 莫拉蒂亲自官方宣布了他的新教练。

sentences.english: Juve are expected to announce Trezeguet's departure before the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 预计在这个月底之前尤文会宣布特雷泽盖的离开。

sentences.english: The paper published an extra to announce the end of the war.
sentences.chinese: 那家报纸出版号外宣布战争结束的消息。

sentences.english: It was unveiled by Tokyo Electric Power Chairman Tsuneihisa Katsumata.
sentences.chinese: 东京电力公司总裁清水正孝宣布了这一计划。

sentences.english: IHG announces the brands expansion into Europe.
sentences.chinese: IHG宣布英迪格酒店品牌扩张至欧洲。

sentences.english: Ha ha. I bet they play this and then announce the event is over.
sentences.chinese: 哈，我打包票他们演奏完后宣布发布会结束。

sentences.english: Earlier this week Kuttner announced he was stepping down from his role
sentences.chinese: 本周早些时候，库特纳宣布将辞去自己的职务。

sentences.english: He waited for the announcement of the result of the competition with bated breath.
sentences.chinese: 他屏息静气地等待宣布竞赛结果。

sentences.english: The birth of qu tunes heralded the birth of a new type of musical system.
sentences.chinese: 曲牌的诞生，宣布了一个新的音乐体系行将诞生。

sentences.english: The sentence of the court was quashed on appeal.
sentences.chinese: 经过上诉，法院的判决被宣布无效。

sentences.english: The occupiers immediately froze wages and made strikes illegal .
sentences.chinese: 占领军立即宣布冻结工资并规定罢工为非法。

sentences.english: In mid-month, Ken Starr announced he was stepping down.
sentences.chinese: 中旬，斯塔尔宣布即将离任。

sentences.english: He was declared persona non grata and thrown out of the country.
sentences.chinese: 他被这个国家宣布为不受欢迎的人并被驱逐出境。

sentences.english: Her selection is still to be formalized and will not be announced until after Thanksgiving.
sentences.chinese: 在感恩节结束之前，希拉里不会正式宣布其决定。

sentences.english: Announcing his resignation, Haarde said he had throat cancer.
sentences.chinese: 在宣布辞职的同时，Haarade称自己患有喉癌。

sentences.english: Former governor of Utah, Jon Huntsman, is running for president.
sentences.chinese: 前犹他州长洪博培宣布竞选总统。

definition: according to a report/It is reported that...
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
to declare one's position/to say where one stands
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
government/official (approved or issued by an authority)
to come to a decision/to fix on (a date etc)/to determine/to finalize/to nail down (a deal etc)
